COVID-19 death toll reaches 25 in Nepal as 55-yr-old dies in Pokhara

Khabarhub

KATHMANDU: The death toll from coronavirus pandemic in Nepal has reached 25 after a 55-year-old man died of the deadly virus in Pokhara on Wednesday night. Khabarhub
